title: Ticket #3095: remove condor_convert_history man page
description: From Alain: We still document the use of condor_convert_history. Since it hasn't been useful since about Condor 6.8 or 7.0 and we no longer distribute it, I propose that we drop it from the manual. (Where "we" is someone other than me, since I no longer know how to safely edit the manual.)
remarks:
